pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, March 18, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a ceremony.

Rideau Hall
1 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive to the Princess Anne Entrance no later than 7:45 a.m.
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery and are asked to confirm their attendance with the Rideau Hall Press Office in advance.
  • Media contact:
    Natalie Babin Dufresne
    Rideau Hall Press Office
    613-993-8158
    natalie.babindufresne@gg.ca

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver a statement in the House of Commons on the terrorist attack in Christchurch, New Zealand.
